plot: The trials and tribulations of the staff at Hatley railway station, who are all wondering if Dr Beeching will close them down.
plot_en: The trials and tribulations of the staff at Hatley railway station, who are all wondering if Dr Beeching will close them down.
plot_es: The trials and tribulations of the staff at Hatley railway station, who are all wondering if Dr Beeching will close them down.
title: Oh Doctor Beeching!
